name: tree-sitter-stack-graphs-typescript
description: Stack graphs definition for TypeScript using tree-sitter-typescript
author: Hendrik van Antwerpen <hendrikvanantwerpen@github.com>

scripts.test: npx tree-sitter-stack-graphs test --grammar node_modules/tree-sitter-typescript --tsg src/stack-graphs --builtins src/builtins test
scripts.test-file: npx tree-sitter-stack-graphs test --grammar node_modules/tree-sitter-typescript --tsg src/stack-graphs --builtins src/builtins
